business.name: New Life Juice
business.description: Premium fresh juice delivery service committed to your health and wellness journey.

hero.title: Fresh. Natural. Life-Changing.
hero.description: Experience the power of premium fresh juices, crafted with the finest ingredients and delivered to your door. Transform your health, one sip at a time.

products.name: Green Detox
products.description: Kale, spinach, cucumber, green apple, and lemon. Your daily dose of green goodness.

products.name: Citrus Burst
products.description: Orange, grapefruit, lime, and ginger. Vitamin C powerhouse to boost your immunity.

products.name: Berry Antioxidant
products.description: Blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, and pomegranate. Packed with antioxidants.

products.name: Tropical Paradise
products.description: Pineapple, mango, coconut water, and passion fruit. Escape to the tropics.

products.name: Root Vegetable
products.description: Carrot, beet, ginger, and turmeric. Earthy flavors with powerful nutrients.

features.title: 100% Organic
features.description: Sourced from certified organic farms with no pesticides or chemicals.

features.title: Cold-Pressed Fresh
features.description: Made fresh daily using cold-press technology to preserve maximum nutrients.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Delivered fresh to your door within 24 hours of pressing.

payment.contactMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to arrange payment and confirm your delivery schedule. We accept:
